string-array.name: banski
string-array.item: Banski Square is one of the oldest and most important in relation to urban areas in Sofia. You can see there Mosque Banya Bashi, Central Mineral bath and Central Halli.
Sofia, between Maria Louiza Boulevard and Ekzarh Joseph Street. \nLocation: 42.699777, 23.322848 (Click to see on the map)
